item.title: ISPO Jumps 46% On Take-Private Deal Just Four Years After Its IPO
item.description: Luxury vacation company Exclusive Investments will take over Inspirato in a deal valued at $59 million.

item.title: Why Did Vistagen Stock Tank 82% Today?
item.description: The company’s PALISADE-3 Phase 3 trial showed no statistically significant difference between fasedienol and placebo in reducing anxiety.

item.title: Ondas Holdings Extends Counter-Drone Deal Streak With Heidelberg Tie-Up
item.description: Ondas' agreement with the German company follows two other counter-drone-related partnerships this month, including an $8.2 million deal to deploy its...

item.title: Frontier Group Stock On Track To Be The Worst Performer Among Major US Airlines In 2025 — All Eyes On A Potential Spirit Merger
item.description: According to a Bloomberg report, a deal could be announced as soon as this month.

item.title: Top Performing Large-Cap Mining Stocks In 2025
item.description: The bullion has jumped over 64% this year to surge past $4,000 per ounce, and remains on course for the best annual gains since 1979.
